title: 服务器人多会一次性掉很多人
author: guppy121
txt_content:
13.01 15:38:34 [服务器] WARN org.sqlite.SQLiteException: [SQLITE_BUSY]  The database file is locked (database is locked)13.01 15:38:34 [服务器] WARN at org.sqlite.core.DB.newSQLException(DB.java:909)13.01 15:38:34 [服务器] WARN at org.sqlite.core.DB.newSQLException(DB.java:921)13.01 15:38:34 [服务器] WARN at org.sqlite.core.DB.execute(DB.java:822)13.01 15:38:34 [服务器] WARN at org.sqlite.core.DB.executeUpdate(DB.java:863)13.01 15:38:34 [服务器] WARN at org.sqlite.jdbc3.JDBC3PreparedStatement.executeUpdate(JDBC3PreparedStatement.java:99)13.01 15:38:34 [服务器] WARN at me.zhanshi123.VipSystem.Utils$1.run(Utils.java:289)13.01 15:38:34 [服务器] WARN at org.bukkit.craftbukkit.v1_12_R1.scheduler.CraftTask.run(CraftTask.java:58)13.01 15:38:34 [服务器] WARN at org.bukkit.craftbukkit.v1_12_R1.scheduler.CraftAsyncTask.run(CraftAsyncTask.java:52)13.01 15:38:34 [服务器] WARN at com.destroystokyo.paper.ServerSchedulerReportingWrapper.run(ServerSchedulerReportingWrapper.java:22)13.01 15:38:34 [服务器] WARN at java.util.concurrent.ThreadPoolExecutor.runWorker(Unknown Source)13.01 15:38:34 [服务器] WARN at java.util.concurrent.ThreadPoolExecutor$Worker.run(Unknown Source)13.01 15:38:34 [服务器] WARN at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source)

以上是报错信息，大概10个人左右就会大批掉人，有没有大佬告知是什么问题，如何解决QAQ，解决了必有重谢

replies.author: yuan_kun
replies.txt_content: 你服务器配置是发一下 或者看看有没有这个插件SQLITE_BUSY
